content: We are happy to introduce you to Energy8.The Energy8 project pursues an ambitious goal - uniting the fascinating world of computer games and the progressive technologies of the blockchain industry.Charging the game balance, p2p-trading inside the gameplay and withdrawing earnings in your own crypto wallet - all this is already available today!Pitchdeck: https://docsend.com/view/9zkrk8rf45r9gbgeWhitepaper: https://docs.energy8.io/v/energy8-whitepaper/introduction/project-vision-and-missionProject Vision & MissionThe main goal of the Energy8 project is to implement cryptocurrency and NFT deposit/withdrawal systems into any existing Web2.0 game, providing a B2B solution for game server owners (or game developers) and B2C solutions for crypto enthusiasts and gamers.Our Energy8 Cryptocurrencies Bridge solution works using a decentralized game node system, based on Proof-Of-Stake mechanism. New games implementation process is very easy, because of our ready-made algorithm and SDK.It's not required to interact with smart contracts and other technologies to start, since our solution is universal and supports all Web 2.0 games.CaseEnergy8 is useful for crypto enthusiasts and gamers around the world.For crypto enthusiasts:1) Rent game node(s) for $8DAO and have income, which depends on the project volume2) Put $8DAO or $E8 tokens into the staking pool and have passive income3) Collect or trade our NFTs and have cool assets for games4) Use our cross-chain bridges for the most of open networks, like Ethereum, Polygon, BNB Chain, etc... and earn new experience5) Pass our testnet campaign and earn rewards (TBA)For gamers:1) Play your favorite game, but in the Play-To-Earn genre, and enjoy improved gameplay2) Play to buy and sell in-game resources to other players and earn $E8 in-game tokens3) Participate in game contests and get cool assets4) Buy our NFTs and gain the upper hand over other gamers to enjoy the process more and increase income5) Participate in predictions for a side's victory in a competition and relishOur social networks:Site: https://energy8.io/Twitter: https://twitter.com/Energy8TokenDiscord:  https://discord.gg/NdyR2B9rSource code: https://github.com/Energy8Token/Energy8Medium: https://energy8.medium.com/Coinmarketcap: https://coinmarketcap.com/ru/currencies/energy8/Bridge example: https://mc.energy8.games/index.htmlTelegram:Main chat: https://t.me/energy8engChat RU: https://t.me/energy8rusMinecraft chat: https://t.me/ENERGYMINECRAFTContact Us: team@energy8.io
